thankyou_screens.title: Congratulations {{hidden:cc_first_name}}, that's your first evaluation module completed. Next up is the module on {{hidden:company_name}}'s organisation.
All done! Thanks for your time.

fields.title: Personal Information

properties.description: Welcome to your first evaluation module {{hidden:cc_first_name}}. The following questions will be about yourself and then we move onto the company.

fields.title: Please confirm that {{hidden:cc_email}} is your business email address.

properties.description: Using a business address that is validated increases the security of your account.
Email

fields.title:
Enter the correct email address. 
I will update your email address in your profile , but your login email address will remain the same until you change it in your user profile.

And is this your mobile number ?

Your mobile number is: {{hidden:cc_mobile}}

properties.description: If no number is shown, select No below to enter it now.

fields.title: Basic Company Information

{{hidden:cc_first_name}}, let us start by gathering some basic some details about {{hidden:company_name}}. 

Some of this information you won't be able to edit after you submit, so it is important for us to check.

properties.description: www

properties.description: www

fields.title: Does {{hidden:company_name}} have a LinkedIn page?

fields.title: Great, enter the URL here.
Describe in 2-3 sentences what problem {{hidden:company_name}} solves.

properties.description: E.g. Small hold farmers have poor access to finance for new machinery to help increase improve efficiency.

fields.title: How does {{hidden:company_name}} solve this problem?

properties.description:
E.g. Company X is a crowdfunding platform allowing farmers to finance farming machinery.

*Note: *This is not a technical description

fields.title: What sector(s) does {{hidden:company_name}} solve for?

properties.description: Note: This is not the same as the sector of the product

fields.title:
Please note, by selecting 'My Industry is not listed' and typing an industry, this will impact your final investor shortlist, awards and incentives.

To authenticate {{hidden:company_name}} and ensure no one is trying to copy your company profile, please upload 's registration document.

properties.description: Please upload this as a PDF document. If not available, this can also be uploaded later in your profile tab

fields.title: Please provide the company registration number.
Is the operating company name the same as the HQ company name?
Enter the legal entity name for {{hidden:company_name}}'s HQ.
Business Information

properties.description: Now that we have covered the basics {{hidden:cc_first_name}}, lets look into in a bit more detail.

fields.title: What I will be asking in the next section  is about your business & revenue model, product description, vision, key milestones and strengths & weaknesses.
What is {{hidden:company_name}}'s type of business model?
As you selected 'Other', please tell me what type of business model your company has.
In a few sentences, describe {{hidden:company_name}}'s revenue model
What is the business vision?

properties.description: i.e. how is the company going to grow and expand and make money? Where will it be in 3-5 years?

fields.title: What key milestones has {{hidden:company_name}} achieved to date?

properties.description: I am looking for things like time to MVP, customers acquired in X time, cash flow positive after X months, anchor customer signed up, etc.

fields.title: What are {{hidden:company_name}}'s strengths?

properties.description:
List a maximum 5 points.

A strength can be location, team, first to market, experienced team, IP that is patented, etc.

fields.title: What are {{hidden:company_name}}'s weaknesses?

properties.description:
List a maximum 5 points.

A weakness is NOT a lack of people or finances. Weaknesses are things the management sees in their business that are a problem or not optimal and that they can do something about given time and money

fields.title: Company Compliance

properties.description: This section is about licencing and regulation the company may need to comply with
